Test.Name: PTZ: Incorrect PTZ configuration is returned in profile after adding PTZ. PTZ config to add was found at the 2nd attemprt. (GetCompatible=false)
Test.Description:
Refresh features with Features.01_03 script
DUT retirns two PTZ configs. DUT sends fauly to add 1st PTZ config. DUT send correct response to add 2nd PTZ config.
DUT returns 1st PTZ config in the profile instaed of 2nd one.

Test.Name: PTZ: No PTZ configuration is returned in profile after adding PTZ. PTZ config to add was found at the 2nd attemprt. (GetCompatible=false)
Test.Description:
Refresh features with Features.01_03 script
DUT retirns two PTZ configs. DUT sends fauly to add 1st PTZ config. DUT send correct response to add 2nd PTZ config.
DUT does not return PTZ config in the profile.

Test.Name: PTZ: Incorrect PTZ configuration is returned in profile after adding PTZ. PTZ config to add was found at the 1st attemprt. (GetCompatible=false)
Test.Description:
Refresh features with Features.01_03 script
DUT retirns two PTZ configs. DUT send correct response to add 1st PTZ config.
DUT returns 2nd PTZ config in the profile instaed of 1st one.

Test.Name: PTZ: No PTZ configuration is returned in profile after adding PTZ. PTZ config to add was found at the 1st attemprt. (GetCompatible=false)
Test.Description:
Refresh features with Features.01_03 script
DUT retirns two PTZ configs. DUT sends correct response to add 1st PTZ config.
DUT does not return PTZ config in the profile.
